example.name: down home cooking
example.text: John hewed at Mary's pot roast with a chainsaw.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: We climbed the roughly hewn stone steps that led to the elevated platform of the temple under the feeble light from an overcast sky.

example.name: Tolkein example-- because it's a dwarfy kind of word.
example.text: Thorin II Oakenshield's shield was broken during the battle and had to use an oak branch that-1 he hewed *trace*-1 off a tree to defend himself.

example.name: veni vidi vici
example.text: To wrestle with a demon in a house owned by a Litchfield, Conn., woman, the Warrens recently called in an exorcist, the Rev. Robert McKenna, a dissident clergyman who-1 *trace*-1 hews to the Catholic Church's old Latin liturgy.
